content: **introducing the year of bulky hats ** we continue to be overwhelmed at the positive reception to our year of hats 1 from 2019 and it was a no brainer to do it again in germantown bulky 2 the school house hat is modeled after a cap courtney s mother wore as a schoolgirl in the 1950s knit by her grandmother while inspired by a hat for children it s also a perfect hat for the young-at-heart this vintage style is super flattering with bangs a curly shag haircut or braids **worthy of note** beginning and ending with i cord ties the school house hat is knit ear to ear with short row worked to create shaping at the back of the head the hat is finished off with a big pompom **yarn** kelbourne woolens germantown bulky 100% n american wool 123 yds/100 gm skein cocoa brown 240 1 skein **gauge** 14 sts and 17 row = 4 10 cm in st st on larger needles after blocking **needles** 1 16 40 cm us 10 6 mm circular or pair straights 2 us 9 5 5 mm dpns *check your gauge and adjust needle size s accordingly if necessary * **notions** darning needle stitch marker kelbourne woolens label sewing thread sharp sewing needle **size** 12 30 5 cm from base of back neck to front of head 16 40 5 cm from ear to ear at back neck 20 75 52 5 cm from ear to ear measured across the center **skills** knitting purling short row i cord **would you like a kit ** ask for one at your favorite lys or find one here 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/year-of-hats/patterns 2 https //kelbournewoolens com/product/kelbourne-woolens-germantown-bulky/ 3 https //kelbournewoolens com/product/year-of-bulky-hats-kit-school-house
